languages.text: {n}Спустя мгновение тварь, почуяв тепло, приходит в движение. Слепо пошарив по коже, она обнаруживает провал вашего носа... и устремляется вперед, растягивая кожу и разрывая слизистую. Нестерпимая боль охватывает вас, когда личинка начинает прокладывать себе путь сквозь мягкие ткани и хрящи, каждое ее движение, кажется, громким хрустом отдается во всем черепе. Создание жадно вгрызается в плоть и движется вперед и выше, выше, за переносицу, за глаза... а затем в ваше сознание вторгается нечто чуждое.{/n}

{n}Sensing warmth, the creature springs into motion a moment later. As it blindly pokes at your skin, it discovers your nostril... and rushes forward, stretching the skin and tearing through the mucous membrane. Unbearable pain overwhelms you as the larva begins to force its way through the soft tissue and cartilage, each of its movements causing a crunching noise to reverberate through your skull. The creature greedily bites into flesh and moves ever upward, past the bridge of your nose, past your eyes... and then something alien invades your consciousness.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sentant la chaleur, la créature se met immédiatement en mouvement. En parcourant aveuglément votre visage, elle découvre votre narine... et se précipite à l'intérieur, étirant la peau et déchirant la muqueuse. Une douleur insupportable vous envahit alors que la larve commence à se frayer un chemin à travers les tissus mous et le cartilage, chacun de ses mouvements provoquant un craquement qui se répercute jusque dans votre crâne. La créature mord avidement la chair et se déplace toujours plus au haut, au-delà de l'arête de votre nez, derrière vos yeux... et soudain, une présence étrangère envahit votre conscience.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sensing warmth, the creature springs into motion a moment later. As it blindly pokes at your skin, it discovers your nostril... and rushes forward, stretching the skin and tearing through the mucous membrane. Unbearable pain overwhelms you as the larva begins to force its way through the soft tissue and cartilage, each of its movements causing a crunching noise to reverberate through your skull. The creature greedily bites into flesh and moves ever upward, past the bridge of your nose, past your eyes... and then something alien invades your consciousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En sentant la chaleur, la créature se met immédiatement en mouvement. En parcourant aveuglément votre visage, elle découvre votre narine... et se précipite à l'intérieur, étirant la peau et déchirant la muqueuse. Une douleur insupportable vous envahit alors que la larve commence à se frayer un chemin à travers les tissus mous et le cartilage, chacun de ses mouvements provoquant un craquement qui se répercute jusque dans votre crâne. La créature mord avidement la chair et se déplace toujours plus au haut, au-delà de l'arête de votre nez, derrière vos yeux... Et soudain, une présence étrangère envahit votre conscience.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这只幼虫感觉到了温暖的触感，马上跳了起来。它在你的皮肤上盲目地戳来戳去，随后发现了你的鼻孔……之后猛地冲了进去，撕扯着你的皮肤，扯裂了你的黏膜。当这只幼虫强行穿过软组织和软骨时，难以忍受的疼痛淹没了你。它每向前移动一寸，你的头骨都传来了嘎吱嘎吱的声音。它贪婪地咬穿了你的血肉，不断地向上移动，越过了你的鼻梁，爬过了你的眼睛……随后，某种古怪的存在侵入了你的意识。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sensing warmth, the creature springs into motion a moment later. As it blindly pokes at your skin, it discovers your nostril... and rushes forward, stretching the skin and tearing through the mucous membrane. Unbearable pain overwhelms you as the larva begins to force its way through the soft tissue and cartilage, each of its movements causing a crunching noise to reverberate through your skull. The creature greedily bites into flesh and moves ever upward, past the bridge of your nose, past your eyes... and then something alien invades your consciousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这只幼虫感觉到了温暖的触感，马上跳了起来。它在你的皮肤上盲目地戳来戳去，随后发现了你的鼻孔……之后猛地冲了进去，撕扯着你的皮肤，扯裂了你的黏膜。当这只幼虫强行穿过软组织和软骨时，难以忍受的疼痛淹没了你。它每向前移动一寸，你的头骨都传来了嘎吱嘎吱的声音。它贪婪地咬穿了你的血肉，不断地向上移动，越过了你的鼻梁，爬过了你的眼睛……随后，某种古怪的存在侵入了你的意识。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ぬくもりを感じ取った一瞬の後に、その生き物は動き出した。闇雲にあなたの皮膚をつつき、鼻の穴を発見すると…皮膚を引き伸ばし、粘膜を引き裂きながら突進した。幼虫が軟組織と軟骨を強引に突き破り始めると、耐え難い痛みがあなたを襲った。バリバリという音が頭蓋骨に響く。幼虫は貪欲に肉に食らいつき、鼻筋を通り過ぎ、目を通り過ぎ…上へと進んでいく。そして、異質な何かがあなたの意識に侵入してきた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sensing warmth, the creature springs into motion a moment later. As it blindly pokes at your skin, it discovers your nostril... and rushes forward, stretching the skin and tearing through the mucous membrane. Unbearable pain overwhelms you as the larva begins to force its way through the soft tissue and cartilage, each of its movements causing a crunching noise to reverberate through your skull. The creature greedily bites into flesh and moves ever upward, past the bridge of your nose, past your eyes... and then something alien invades your consciousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ぬくもりを感じ取った一瞬の後に、その生き物は動き出した。闇雲にあなたの皮膚をつつき、鼻の穴を発見すると…皮膚を引き伸ばし、粘膜を引き裂きながら突進した。幼虫が軟組織と軟骨を強引に突き破り始めると、耐え難い痛みがあなたを襲った。バリバリという音が頭蓋骨に響く。幼虫は貪欲に肉に食らいつき、鼻筋を通り過ぎ、目を通り過ぎ…上へと進んでいく。そして、異質な何かがあなたの意識に侵入してきた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Kreatur nimmt die Wärme wahr und bewegt sich einen Augenblick später schlagartig. Sie stochert blindlings in deiner Haut herum, bis sie dein Nasenloch findet ... dann stürzt sie nach vorne, zieht die Haut auf und zerreißt die Nasenschleimhaut. Du wirst von unerträglichem Schmerz überwältigt, als sich die Larve durch das weiche Gewebe und den Knorpel zwängt. Jede ihrer Bewegungen löst ein knirschendes Geräusch aus, das in deinem Schädel widerhallt. Die Kreatur beißt sich gierig durch dein Fleisch und bewegt sich weiter nach oben, vorbei am Nasenrücken, vorbei an deinen Augen ... Und plötzlich dringt etwas Fremdes in dein Bewusstsein ein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sensing warmth, the creature springs into motion a moment later. As it blindly pokes at your skin, it discovers your nostril... and rushes forward, stretching the skin and tearing through the mucous membrane. Unbearable pain overwhelms you as the larva begins to force its way through the soft tissue and cartilage, each of its movements causing a crunching noise to reverberate through your skull. The creature greedily bites into flesh and moves ever upward, past the bridge of your nose, past your eyes... and then something alien invades your consciousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Kreatur nimm die Wärme wahr und bewegt sich kurz darauf. Sie stochert blindlings in deiner Haut herum, bis sie dein Nasenloch findet ... dann stürzt sie nach vorne, zieht die Haut auf und zerreißt die Nasenschleimhaut. Du wirst von unerträglichem Schmerz überwältigt, als sich die Larve durch das weiche Gewebe und die Knorpel zwängt. Jede ihrer Bewegungen löst ein knirschendes Geräusch aus, das in deinem Schädel widerhallt. Die Kreatur beißt sich gierig durch dein Fleisch und bewegt sich weiter nach oben, vorbei am Nasenrücken, vorbei an deinen Augen ... Und plötzlich dringt etwas Fremdes in dein Bewusstsein ein.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al notar tu calidez, la criatura se agita de repente. Tantea tu piel a ciegas hasta encontrar tus fosas nasales... e irrumpe en una de ellas, estirándote la carne y rasgando tu membrana mucosa. Un dolor insoportable se apodera de ti mientras la larva se abre paso a través del tejido blando y el cartílago; sus movimientos producen sonoros crujidos que reverberan en tu cráneo. La criatura horada muerde vorazmente tu carne y asciende por el conducto, más allá del puente de tu nariz, más allá de tus ojos... y entonces una presencia ajena invade tu consciencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sensing warmth, the creature springs into motion a moment later. As it blindly pokes at your skin, it discovers your nostril... and rushes forward, stretching the skin and tearing through the mucous membrane. Unbearable pain overwhelms you as the larva begins to force its way through the soft tissue and cartilage, each of its movements causing a crunching noise to reverberate through your skull. The creature greedily bites into flesh and moves ever upward, past the bridge of your nose, past your eyes... and then something alien invades your consciousness.{/n}

Un dolor insoportable se apodera de ti mientras la larva se abre paso a través del tejido blando y el cartílago; sus movimientos producen sonoros crujidos que reverberan en tu cráneo. languages.text: {n}Sıcaklığı hisseden yaratık, kısa sürede harekete geçiyor. Tenini körlemesine yokluyor, burun deliklerini keşfediyor ve içeri dalıyor. Tenini deliyor, mukoza zarını yırtıp geçiyor. Larva, yumuşak dokulardan ve kıkırdaklardan geçerken tahammül edilemez bir acı duyuyorsun. Her bir hareketiyle, kafatasının içine birer kütürtü aksediyor. Yaratık, açgözlülükle etini kemirmeyi sürdürerek yukarı doğru devam ediyor. Burun kemiğini ve gözlerini geçtikten sonra bilincin, yabancı bir şey tarafından istila ediliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sensing warmth, the creature springs into motion a moment later. As it blindly pokes at your skin, it discovers your nostril... and rushes forward, stretching the skin and tearing through the mucous membrane. Unbearable pain overwhelms you as the larva begins to force its way through the soft tissue and cartilage, each of its movements causing a crunching noise to reverberate through your skull. The creature greedily bites into flesh and moves ever upward, past the bridge of your nose, past your eyes... and then something alien invades your consciousness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sıcaklık hisseden yaratık kısa sürede harekete geçiyor. Tenini körlemesine yokluyor, burun deliklerini keşfediyor ve içeri dalıyor. Tenini deliyor ve mukoza zarını yırtıp geçiyor. Larva yumuşak dokulardan ve kıkırdaklardan geçerken tahammül edilemez bir acı duyuyorsun. Her bir hareketi, kafatasının içine akseden bir kütürtü sesine sebep oluyor. Yaratık açgözlülükle etini kemirmeyi sürdürerek yukarı doğru devam ediyor. Burnunun köprüsünü geçiyor, gözlerini geçiyor ve ardından bilincin, yabancı bir şey tarafından istila ediliyor.{/n}
